title: New: Animal Collective – Crimson
body:
**Animal Collective** have dropped the b-side to their upcoming ‘_Applesauce_‘ 10″ single, which comes in the form of unreleased material.

_Crimson_ was premiered over at **Zane Lowe**‘s **BBC Radio 1** show last night, however if you didn’t catch it, we certainly didn’t, then hit play below.

excerpt.full: Animal Collective have dropped the b-side to their upcoming ‘Applesauce‘ 10″ single, which comes in the form of unreleased material. Crimson was premiered over at Zane Lowe‘s BBC Radio 1 show last night, however if you didn’t catch it, we certainly didn’t, then hit play below.
